dict.acceptation: 分给，分配；任务，工作，（课外）作业；<美>任命；指定，委派；

sent.orig: Lead into this assignment with an assignment exchange from the previous week.
sent.trans: 把这个作业和前一周的作业进行交换。

sent.orig: If assignment ends earlier, the teacher in charge will make a assignment for you.
sent.trans: 指定工作提前结束时，由负责老师安排其他工作。

sent.orig: An Assignment sheet needs to be included with each assignment. Please complete all details clearly.
sent.trans: 每一项作业都必须包含作业封面，请清楚、详细地填写以下内容。

sent.orig: Year assignment and after completion of the assignment, the participant will initiate to work regularly.
sent.trans: 该项目持续时间1.5年。项目结束后开始正式工作。

sent.orig: Preparing and executing the Assignment document. For Assignment without goodwill, additional advertising is required.
sent.trans: 费用包括准备有关部门转让文件、交申请以及缴付官方费用。
